title: African Elephant
content: Largest land mammal, known for its tusks and large ears.

title: Lion
content: Apex predator known as 'King of the Jungle' despite living in savannas.
caption: Lion resting in the grass.

title: Cheetah
content: Fastest land animal, capable of speeds up to 60-70 mph.
caption: Illustration of a cheetah.

title: Giraffe
content: Tallest terrestrial animal with a long neck for reaching trees.
caption: Giraffe with its distinctive long neck.

title: African Buffalo
content: Strong herbivore known for its unpredictable nature and large herds.

title: Rhinoceros
content: Large herbivores known for their distinct horn(s) on their snout.
caption: Historical illustration of a Rhinoceros by Albrecht DÃ¼rer.

title: Hippopotamus
content: Semi-aquatic mammals known for their massive size and large jaws.

title: Zebra
content: Known for its distinctive black and white striped coat.

title: Gorilla
content: Largest primate, found primarily in central African forests.
caption: Male Gorilla in a forest.

title: Crocodile
content: Large aquatic reptiles found in African rivers and lakes.
caption: Crocodile isolated on white background.

title: Wildebeest
content: Known for their migratory behavior, part of the Great Migration.
caption: "Blackbuck antelope grazing in the grassland."

title: Flamingo
content: Wading bird known for its pink feathers and long legs.
caption: Lesser Flamingo in a lake.
